description: Checks whether an EFO product is blocked due to malice-related issues. When blocked, the product cannot be included in new lazada requests, and its warehouse inventory is excluded from being sold.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration to successful Request for all headers

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shoppe's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp. Please Sign API Request with HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if err exists; Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if err error; Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: is_block
response_fields.description: product is blocked and warehouse block cannot be sold

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
